item.title: Point72 的 Drossos 称日本正在破坏对日元的单向投注
item.description: Point72 的索菲亚-德罗索斯（Sophia Drossos）认为，从一个角度来看，日本支撑日元的干预措施已经实现了一个关键目标：防止市场对日元进行一边倒的押注。【原文：By one measure, according to Point72’s Sophia Drossos, Japan’s intervention to prop up the yen has achieved a key objective: Preventing the market from piling into lopsided bets against the currency.】

item.title: 区块链将 10%的比特币利润用于比特币投资
item.description: 随着杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）的公司豪赌比特币的未来，Block Inc.【原文：Block Inc. lifted its full-year profit guidance and revealed plans to invest a portion of its profits from Bitcoin back into the assets, as Jack Dorsey’s company bets big on the currency’s future.】

item.title: 贷款人称银行 "破碎 "模式加剧了房地产挑战
item.description: 麦迪逊房地产资本公司（Madison Realty Capital）联合创始人乔希-泽根（Josh Zegen）认为，银行业的 "残缺 "模式正在给商业房地产行业的融资带来问题。【原文：A “broken” model in banking is creating issues for financing in the commercial real estate industry, according to Josh Zegen, co-founder of Madison Realty Capital.】

item.title: 加蓬雇用花旗集团召开投资者会议，因为债券损失不断增加
item.description: 加蓬本周将与固定收益投资者会面，因为财政和政治风险引发的溃败震撼了这个非洲中部国家的债券市场。【原文：Gabon is meeting with fixed-income investors this week as a rout fueled by fiscal and political risks rocks the central African nation’s bond market.】

item.title: 货币基金资产三周来首次增至 6 万亿美元
item.description: 货币市场基金资产三周来首次升至 6 万亿美元以上，因为在美联储决策者发出不急于放松货币政策的信号后，市场预期短期利率将继续走高。【原文：Money-market fund assets rose above $6 trillion for the first time in three weeks on expectations short-term rates will remain elevated after Federal Reserve policymakers signaled they are in no rush to ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 路透社称嘉能可考虑竞购英美资源集团
item.description: 据路透社报道，嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）正在评估对英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的潜在竞购，此举可能为该矿业公司的收购战埋下伏笔。【原文：Glencore Plc is evaluating a potential bid for Anglo American Plc, a move that could set up a takeover battle for the mining company, Reuters reported.】

item.title: ECP 正在就收购 Atlantica Sustainable 进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Energy Capital Partners 正在就收购可再生能源资产所有者 Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure Plc 进行深入谈判。【原文：Energy Capital Partners is in advanced talks to acquire Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure Plc, an owner of renewable power assets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Duolingo首席执行官谈语言学习、人工智能和验证码的终结
item.description: 生成式人工智能的突破为人类向计算机学习创造了巨大的机会。我们可以用它们来解释新闻、理解历史概念、纠正我们的编码错误等等。当然，人工智能也需要向人类学习。人工智能技术需要消化大量的书面文本，并经常依赖人类的反馈来校准其模型。路易斯-冯-安（Luis von Ahn）多年来一直站在这些来回互动的最前沿。他目前是【原文：Breakthroughs in generative AI have created enormous opportunities for humans to learn from computers. We can use them to explain the news, understand historical concepts, fix our coding errors, and so forth. But of course, AI also has to learn from human. The technology digests enormous amounts of written text, and often relies on human feedback to calibrate its models. Luis von Ahn has been at the forefront of these back and forth interactions for years. He is currently the CEO and co-founder】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金通过防御性股票购买保护措施
item.description: 由于地缘政治和利率走势的不确定性，以及四月份股市的暴跌，令投资专家们感到恐慌，对冲基金正日益转向防御。【原文：Hedge funds are turning increasingly defensive as uncertainty around geopolitics and the path of interest rates, as well as the stock market’s April swoon, has investing pros spooked.】

item.title: 英特尔芯片制造厂出售 38.5 亿美元债券
item.description: 一家与英特尔公司在亚利桑那州扩建电脑芯片工厂有关的公司将于本周四出售 38.5 亿美元的投资级债券。【原文：A company tied to Intel Corp.’s expansion of computer chip factories in Arizona is selling $3.85 billion of investment-grade bonds on Thursday.】

item.title: 纳斯达克计划为商品和国债 ETF 提供更多短期期权
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc. ）计划在未来几周内寻求监管机构批准与一系列商品和国债交易所交易基金挂钩的合约周一到期，这是市场对短期期权兴趣浓厚的最新迹象。【原文：In the latest sign of booming interest in short-duration options, Nasdaq Inc. plans in coming weeks to seek regulatory approval for Monday expiries on contracts tied to a suite of commodities and Treasuries exchange traded funds.】

item.title: 费森尤斯向 PAI 出售 Vamed 康复业务控股权
item.description: 费森尤斯公司（Fresenius SE）已同意向法国私募股权公司 PAI Partners 出售其 Vamed 旗下康复业务的控股权，这家德国医疗保健公司正在进一步缩减其投资组合。【原文：Fresenius SE has agreed to sell a controlling stake in the rehabilitation business of its Vamed unit to French private equity firm PAI Partners as the German healthcare company further trims its portfolio.】

item.title: 汇款少于预期为墨西哥经济增长前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 3 月份，海外墨西哥人汇回国内的资金少于预期，这是对经济降温的又一次打击。【原文：Mexicans abroad sent home less money than expected in March in another blow to the cooling economy.】

item.title: 布宜诺斯艾利斯市考虑出售全球债券，官员将与投资者会面
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布宜诺斯艾利斯市计划下周与全球投资者会面，探讨八年来首次出售海外美元债券事宜。【原文：The city of Buenos Aires plans to meet with global investors next week as it explores selling overseas dollar bonds for the first time in eight years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部长表示，津巴布韦寻求 ZiG 货币的完全可兑换性
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，津巴布韦将寻求实现其新货币 ZiG 的完全可兑换，以此进一步支持该货币单位并防止其崩溃。【原文：Zimbabwe will seek full convertibility of its new currency, the ZiG, as a way to further support the unit and protect it from collapse, according to Mthuli Ncube, the Finance Minister.】

item.title: 借款人冲击债务市场，穆迪盈利超预期
item.description: 穆迪公司（Moody's Corp.）公布的第一季度盈利超出预期，评级提供商受益于利差缩小带来的新股发行激增。【原文：Moody’s Corp. reported first-quarter earnings that beat expectations as the ratings provider benefited from a surge of new issuance fueled by shrinking spreads.】

item.title: 钯金公司 Kymera 正在与贷款人商谈再融资和收购公司事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，材料公司 Kymera International 正在与包括私人信贷公司在内的贷款机构洽谈债务再融资和支付潜在收购费用的事宜。【原文：Materials company Kymera International is in conversations with lenders, including private credit firms, to refinance its debt and pay for a potential acquisition, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Ares 认为并购驱动型私人信贷的机会正在增加
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Ares Management Corp. 预计今年晚些时候交易量将有所回升，此前该公司报告称，本季度新并购活动的贷款额度不高。【原文：Ares Management Corp. anticipates a pickup in deals later this year after the alternative-asset manager reported a muted quarter for lending to new mergers and acquisitions activity.】

item.title: ICICI 证券任命两位银行家为 ECM 业务联席主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度工业信贷投资银行（ICICI Bank Ltd. ）任命了两位资深银行家担任其投资银行部门股票资本市场部的负责人。【原文：ICICI Bank Ltd. named two senior bankers to head the equity capital markets division of its investment banking unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Cinven 放弃 10 亿英镑的出售计划，寻求为 JLA 再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Cinven 在取消出售英国公司 JLA 的计划后，正寻求为这家商业服务公司进行再融资。【原文：Buyout firm Cinven is looking to refinance business services firm JLA after pulling a planned sale of the UK company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首席执行官认为农民农作物支出前景良好，Corteva 公司业绩上升
item.description: 种子和农药生产商 Corteva Inc. 公布的季度收益超出预期，其首席执行官表示农民支出前景强劲，此后该公司股价创下三个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Corteva Inc. shares rose the most in three months after the seed and pesticide maker posted quarterly earnings that beat expectations while its CEO signaled a strong outlook for farmer spending.】

item.title: 股价飙升，Carvana 空头损失达 39 亿美元
item.description: Carvana Co.周四的大涨加重了做空者的痛苦，在过去一年里，随着二手车零售商股价的反弹，做空者押注该公司的损失惨重。【原文：Carvana Co.’s surge Thursday added to pain for short sellers who’ve amassed major losses betting against the used car retailer as its shares have rebounded over the last year.】

item.title: 太阳马戏团联合主席的公司考虑进行埃弗顿融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，专门从事不良债务业务的私募股权公司 GDA Luma Capital 已成为埃弗顿俱乐部收购案的潜在拯救者。【原文：GDA Luma Capital, a private equity firm specializing in distressed debt, has emerged as a potential rescuer of a takeover bid for Everton FC, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第五周上升，达到 7.22
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率连续第五周攀升，加大了购房者的压力。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed for a fifth week, ratcheting up the pressure on homebuyers.】

item.title: 安盛与阿波罗旗下 Athora 在德国取消人寿保险交易
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Athora Holding Ltd., an insurance affiliate of Apollo Global Management Inc., and Axa SA have terminated a deal to transfer life insurance policies in Germany almost two years after announcing it.】

item.title: KKR 面向大众富裕阶层的投资工具融资 18 亿美元
item.description: KKR & Co.努力向所谓的大众富裕阶层伸出援手，通过单一渠道从 12,000 多名投资者那里筹集了 17.8 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co.’s effort to reach the so-called mass affluent raised $1.78 billion from more than 12,000 investors in a single vehicle.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司 24 年来首次出现净亏损
item.description: 俄罗斯国家控制的天然气巨头报告称，由于向欧洲的运输量下降和燃料价格下降，该公司自 1999 年以来首次出现年度净亏损。【原文：Russia’s state-controlled gas giant reported its first annual net loss since 1999 on falling shipments to Europe and lower prices for the fuel.】

item.title: SPAC 老将克莱因回归，近三年来首次进行 IPO
item.description: 老牌交易商迈克尔-克莱因（Michael Klein）近三年来首次重返空头支票领域，在此之前，这一曾经红极一时的投资风潮已经破灭，保荐人和投资者为此损失了数十亿美元。【原文：Veteran dealmaker Michael Klein has returned to the blank-check arena for the first time in nearly three years, after the once red-hot investing trend went bust and cost sponsors and investors billions.】

item.title: 野村和瑞穗在基金交易失败后面临 1.08 亿美元损失
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc）和瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc）正面临着超过 1 亿美元的潜在损失，这些损失与投资基金 All Blue Capital 的一系列失败股票交易有关。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. and Mizuho Financial Group Inc. are facing more than $100 million of potential losses tied to a series of failed stock trades made by investment fund All Blue Capital.】

item.title: 夜视公司 Exosens 在巴黎首次公开募股中募集 4 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国夜视技术公司 Exosens 正计划在巴黎进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能在 3 亿至 4 亿欧元之间。【原文：French night-vision technology company Exosens is planning an initial public offering in Paris that may raise between €300 million and €400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】
